website_summaries.verdict: The superb-sounding Sennheiser HD 598 offers some of the best sense of space we've heard from $250 headphones.
pros: Excellent balance of the entire frequency range with a strong sense of space
cons: Retro color scheme not for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the audiophile
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable earphones could sleep with them on but not just that the sound is great it has a very wide sound-stage so you can hear things you hadn't heard before in certain songs the overall sound is pretty neutral perhaps bit more on the mid/high if anything the bass isn't your low rumble type it's more of a punch sound which is fine for me as I don't listen to a lot of dance/dubstep. These headphones don't require a headphone amp but they do still have a higher impedance than normal lower priced headphones so you may have to crank volume up on certain devices.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S

customer_reviews.title: Something to behold
customer_reviews.text: The best headphones I have ever owned. I really do feel that these are the best quality headphones for this price range at the moment since the audio quality is something to behold. The open ear design makes it feel as if you were really there, listening to the music. I also use these headphones for gaming and they are perfect. The main reason I got these headphones was for comfort. My ears are really sensitive and using on-ear headphones for at least 10 minutes make my ears ache unbearably. This cup design on these is much more bearable as I can have these on for countless hours and not even notice that they are there.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: perfect as always
customer_reviews.text: Sennheiser, perfect as always. I had an identical pair to these (but in black) for 10 years! I figured why not get the same ones for another 10 years! They are super comfortable, the sound is supreme and it is the best open headphone I have ever had. I find it extremely good and important to have an open headphone as you can head what is going on around you and you can have a conversation with colleagues and people if you need to get a quick message. You could obviously keep these headphones on all the time, but I think eventually that would be a bit rude towards the people around you...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A true audiophile experience, really good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: A reasonably priced pair of premium Open back headphones. They are well made and super comfortable and have a luxurious appearance well suited to home hi fi use. Unlike other hi fidelity phones they have a relatively low impedance and don't need a huge amp to sound good or loud,although one usually helps for sound dynamics. They have a great sound quality, very natural and balanced in tone, bass, mids and treble all clean and clearly represented. Soundstage width, depth and precision are all superb and detail is fantastic. A very good buy if you don't want to spend silly money on truly audiophile headphones for the home.
customer_reviews.author: christine grindley

customer_reviews.title: Another great disappointment from the once great Sennheiser
customer_reviews.text: Another great disappointment from the once great Sennheiser. This was my second purchase from this maker in a year, that I regretted. The first buy was for a model twice the price of this one ( I was so impressed I forget the model ). In both cases, the upper reaches were missing, no clarity of spaciousness, and the bass was muddy and vague. Now, I'm in my mid 70's, and impairment of hearing is expected BUT--my 20 year old HD 330's ( Sennheiser) can still provide the missing sound range--so it cannot be put down to impairment---over to you Sennheiser. P G Croft UK
customer_reviews.author: P. G. Croft

customer_reviews.title: Normally I avoid large headphones as I hate how they feel with my glasses (my old pair ...
customer_reviews.text: Normally I avoid large headphones as I hate how they feel with my glasses (my old pair is a PX100), however these are by far the comfiest headphones I have ever worn! As for the sound, it took a day or two to get used to (maybe some burn-in?), but it's fantastic for my favourite style of music (electronica), I was also amazed at some sword sounds in a computer game. I used to have a cable extender for my old headphones but the cable is so long with these that I don't need one any more. Has a lot of sound escaping but I'm not bothering anyone else, and bassheads will want to avoid this.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: A fabulous buy !
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fabulous headphones, I've always had Senneisers and can only say these are exceptional in every kind of music ether streamed via my I pad or home HiFi. Spacious sound quality with great separation and internation between instruments .. A really involving sound which tends to make all music listened to take longer some how ... Because it's more involving ! Now Im wondering if a headphone amplifier will take it a step higher! A great buy the only difference is the SE version is black and comes with a shorter cable so you can use them with a Iphone or other portable device .
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Purchased during Black Friday week at an unbelievable price. Nice comfortable headphones that I use for listening to music on an ipad,, smartphone, and for Hi-Fi use. Sennheiser have been making headphones forever and good ones too. Even during the 70s they were tonally bright i.e. the famous HD400, HD414, HD424 which must have sold millions, I know I sold hundreds! So on receiving these I new if they wasn't to my taste I could return them to Amazon. Summary - Good detailed headphones, slightly on the brighter side as expected but when used for many hours settle down nicely. definitely worth listening to (and buying) and justifies all the 5* ratings given here.
customer_reviews.author: Mightymouse

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, the best headphones I have ever used. They have to be the some of the most comfortable headphones out there. They are open headphones which are not designed to be used in noisy environments or in public places really although there is nothing stopping you. One issue I was concerned about was sound leakage as I use them while in Skype to my friends but although there is sound leakage it is pretty much only noticeable at high volumes. I would have liked to have seen a case including but apart from that amazing.
customer_reviews.author: JEIKOBU

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones. Leak sound like there's no tomorrow but ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphones. Leak sound like there's no tomorrow but since I bought them for home use it's not much of a complaint. Comfortable (even when wearing glasses) and excellent sound quality. Comes with one of those giant cable jacks for sound systems and such; I had to buy an adapter so they'd fit a regular headphone socket. Unfortunately some of the covering on the inside of the headband where the cushioning is has started to peel back after extensive use. It doesn't bother me too much but it is unsightly. Something to be aware of. I'd still recommend them to just about anybody.
customer_reviews.author: P Jones

customer_reviews.title: They leak sound like nobodies business though so wouldn't recommend them if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a while and they are the comfiest most amaxingheadphones I have ever owned. They leak sound like nobodies business though so wouldn't recommend them if you are studying in a library or working in an office. They are studio headphones after all. Sound quality is impeccable, songs I have been listening to for years sound completely different when I am wearing them you feel like you are in the studio with the artists!
customer_reviews.author: theory501

customer_reviews.title: Impressionable friends will be transfixed when hearing you prounce Sennheiser correctly
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no point droning on and waxing lyrical about these 'cans' - as there are oodles of reviews already, but no complaints whatsoever from my yard. The sound staging improves over time, the build quality is adequate, but don't throw them around your studio/study/house (as if you would darlings)... so yes, if these pop up in a sale, as they did for me, buy them without hesitation. Oh yes, extremely comfortable as well and you get to impress friends when pronouncing Sennheiser correctly :-)
customer_reviews.author: Beardfreak

customer_reviews.title: These headphones have great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have great sound quality. We are using them with a digital piano so people can practice without disturbing others. The open back design is something we haven't tried before but we are liking it. Basically, if you are alone in the house listening to something the open back design lets in a good bit of the ambient sounds - this allows you to still hear the phone or doorbell ring while you are listening. Obviously that would not make these a good idea for commuter headphones.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best headset ive ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best headset ive ever owned, I can wear it for hours at a time since it fits so nicley on my head upgraded to this headset from a Senheiser Hd 201 and I couldn't be happier with how it sounds 10/10 would reccomend to people buying their first quality headset.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable. Quality of sound is exactly how I like ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable. Quality of sound is exactly how I like it - clear and precise without being harsh and also a strong bass which is well balanced and doesn't intrude or dominate the music. To my ears a very natural sound and good with a wide genre of music. Listening is a pleasure and allows me to concentrate on the music (if that's what I feel like doing) and not spend my time thinking about the headphones. I'm a happy bunny.
customer_reviews.author: Geekers

customer_reviews.title: Sennheiser at the top of their form.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful open sound stage, extremely comfortable cups. Paired with a mod-mic 5, this is the best headset i have ever used. The mic does not even pickup the open back bleed through. Lightest headphones I have ever used. When taking them off, between the light weight and the seamless soundstage it does not have that "exiting/entering a new environment" feeling i get removing more closed/heavier headphones. I will concede that the bass is a little undefined though, The 598s feel a little TOO un-opinionated, great for most cases but if your regular use is heavier/party music .... Maybe shop around.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality, comfortable and stylish and no problems. The 3m cable turned out to be fine (I bought an extension [which also worked fine with it] in case it wasn't). Lucky enough to have bought it on 'Black Friday' in 2015 when the price dropped from £199 to £75 (over 60% off the price!) as I had kept an eye on it price-wise as it often was reduced to £125 - £150. It was actually cheaper than many inferior Sennheiser models that day. Best bargain all year! Hopefully the same offer was on again this year (2016) for some eagle-eyed Amazon customers!
customer_reviews.author: Engineer Andy

customer_reviews.title: An improvement on my old Sennheiser headphones
customer_reviews.text: I had been using an old pair of Sennheiser HD 455 Headphones (open back) circa 1995 and which have served me well over the past number of years, but regretfully in need of repair. When I saw the HD 598 SE being offered it was a no brainer to go for an upgrade especially as they were on offer at £75.00 in the Black Friday deal. Having now used them for several weeks, the HD598 SE which are also open back are an improvement, giving more clarity to the music I am listening to.
customer_reviews.author: Veritas

customer_reviews.title: Top notch sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are fantastic! They offer a nice warm sound, with plenty of bass and balanced mids-high. The give a good depth to the listening experience also, i think this is because they are open back headphones. You wouldn't use these headphones in a public place for two reasons, people would be able to hear everything that you are listening to and also you would be able to hear everything around you. They are perfect for listening to films on as well, they really add to the movie experience. 10/10 would buy these again if they broke (which i cant see happening as they are really well made.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Simply great sound. Bear in mind this is an open ...
customer_reviews.text: Simply great sound. Bear in mind this is an open back model, not very well described as detail, so the isolation of the sound is not as good as the one you get with closed back model. The quality though in quite good for the money. I personally use this headphones at work, for many hours and they are absolutely very comfortable. Used with a reasonable volume, you won't disturb anybody, though you will be able to hear someone talking with you, which is a plus when you are working; and when you're not, you can pump the volume a bit more and they will do a great job.
customer_reviews.author: C.D.

customer_reviews.title: I'm no audiophile but I do like things to sound good and these do just that
customer_reviews.text: Had these since 9 Mar 2012 apparently and they're still going strong. Tried several other similar priced headphones and keep coming back to these. I'm no audiophile but I do like things to sound good and these do just that. Gaming is excellent (though lacks bass if that's your thing), and music and movies are very enjoyable. I do find them a little loose mind you and the colour scheme isn't to everybody's taste, but what can you do, eh?:P
customer_reviews.author: Phil G

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Exceptionally comfortable with no 'head-pinch', I can wear these literally all day. They have clear, well-balanced sound, just like all the reviews say. The cable is very long, but as it's detachable, is easily replaced with a shorter version should it prove unwieldy. The best headphones I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Gaxxian

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Had these for almost a year now, I'm not an audiophile but I can appreciate good quality headphones especially as a regular gamer and kpop fan :) They are comfy to wear and not heavy at all, and after using cheap £20~ headphones since forever, picking these up was a real treat. They are pretty expensive though, however I managed to snatch a cheap pair during sales so I only had to pay around £75. Really happy with these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: My god top notch phones beautifully balanced cans
customer_reviews.text: My god top notch phones beautifully balanced cans .not particularly an elvis fan but just listened to both albums elvis and the Royal philharmonic orchestra elvis voice and the Philly's top notch musical talents combined are a revelation when heard on these cans.buy buy buy .
customer_reviews.author: da do ron ron

customer_reviews.title: Music revisited!
customer_reviews.text: I admit, I'm new to high end headphones so may be impressed easily but these are something special. I did own Grado 80's before and they sounded good but were uncomfortable. These are a world apart to my ears. Rich, clear, spacious and detailed. And so comfortable. Using them with a Fiio E7k DAC and amplifier on my ipad with a lightening usb camera connection kit. A fantastic sound, just make sure your music is 256kbs or higher or you will notice the difference. Started listening to all my old music again. Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Bluecraig99

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones if you can pick them up for less than £180
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've made for my computer/audio set up. I purchased these for £160, and they're so good. I use them everyday at home for music and gaming. Excellent audio quality. Shame that there's not much bass (which doesn't bother me, but sometimes I do wish there was some more umph) but that can be alleviated with a sound card/DAC I assume. Which I intend to purchase if I do upgrade to some 600s. If you're paying over £190 to get them, I'd get the 650s to be honest
customer_reviews.author: JKelloggs

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is amazing, it makes everything so immersive
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use these for gaming on my PC and watching movies/tv shows. The sound quality is amazing, it makes everything so immersive. Before this I mostly used my Sennheiser Momentum's and these are such much more comfortable. Where the Momentum's started becoming uncomfortable when using them for long periods of time, I can wear these all day and never have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: govi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable to wear and the music quality is outstanding. I definitely recommend it. I should note that these are not the most bassy headphones around, so if you want a lot of bass, you should look elsewhere. If you're interested in just pure excellent music quality, than these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: igdws

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic all round performance when used with an amp
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic all round performance when used with an amp. A massive point to note is that using these through an amp improves them by so so much. The depth and bass when using the 3.5mm adapter plugged into my laptop was poor. 5 stars because the quality I get via an amp is brilliant but if you are going to plug them straight into a laptop or phone I would look at alternatives. Hope that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A Kloten

customer_reviews.title: Great audio.
customer_reviews.text: I love these, the audio quality is amazing, though not for outdoor use unless you want everyone listening with you. The are loud and clear, and the black design is much better than the cream of the original.
customer_reviews.author: Haroon R Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality and very comfortable to use. The only minor downside is that the original cable it comes with is too long and bulky (it depends on what you need, of course), but this can be replaced very easily if you get a compatible cable.
customer_reviews.author: H.P.

customer_reviews.title: I listen to mediaeval and renaissance choral music and wasn't sure whether they would be good for that kind of music - but they
customer_reviews.text: I looked at hundreds of headphone reviews and finally settled on these headphones. I listen to mediaeval and renaissance choral music and wasn't sure whether they would be good for that kind of music - but they are fabulous!! They give a good sense of "being there". Great with portable CD player as well as hi-fi. They're very comfortable indeed and components are good quality. Initially it felt daft to be wearing what looks a bit like a sports car steering wheel but who cares when the sound is this good? Brilliant product.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for most musical tastes. Open back takes a bit of time to settle,, but responses are good, possibly some headphones are a little more balanced throughout the range, but still worth the price. Not great for portable audio die to higher impedance, better for in house hifi and setups with good amps, but that's why you need to compare for what you require headphones to be used with.
customer_reviews.author: Andi MacInnes

customer_reviews.title: these are the best i've ever used for all spectrums of life and ...
customer_reviews.text: I must say that out of all the headphones i've ever used before, these are the best i've ever used for all spectrums of life and music. Bests buy ever. The seller was super fast and it came early. Thank you for being so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Vicentini

customer_reviews.title: which I love for most types of music - tighter base control
customer_reviews.text: Bought these "open" headphones for classical and accoustic music - sound is detailed and open. I already own the Audio-Technica ATH M50X, which I love for most types of music - tighter base control. I prefer the audio technical for rock and modern music.
customer_reviews.author: 3dcnc

customer_reviews.title: Sennheiser / Wonderful Noise
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant, clear crisp sound, very comfortable even when wearing for extended times, Orchestral music, film scores and general use all have rich warm sharp tones. These replaced my Sony headphones which were great for games also but these definitely worth the extra pounds.
customer_reviews.author: David Pye

customer_reviews.title: Superbly comfortable, wonderful sound and an amazing soundstage
customer_reviews.text: Superbly comfortable, wonderful sound and an amazing soundstage. Best money can buy. Plastic does feel a little flimsy but it doesn't clamp onto your head. You put it on and forget that it's even there. Would've been better with a 3.5mm jack instead of the huge one it has right now, but the added adapter negates this flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Kheng Boon Pek

customer_reviews.title: now that i've had a chance to play with them i would easily pay the full price too
customer_reviews.text: bought these for 60 quid on black friday... now that i've had a chance to play with them i would easily pay the full price too. amazing soft but tight bass, exceptional vocal separation, crisp but not fatiguing highs... the sound is just perfect, and delivers a stunningly wide sound stage. as for build quality, they are extremely well built, miles ahead of my now retired 448's... comfortable, airy, open, precise... beautiful cans also, delivery took almost a week less than originally estimated, so there are really no downsides to them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Movie sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I've never spent this amount on headphones before and so I really heavily checked this pairs reviews. And I have to say they are superb sounding. I haven't even listened to music with them yet but I was watchihg a bourne movie on bluray and the sound blew me away. It literally was like being in a movie theatre, just superb.
customer_reviews.author: Dyerman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Quality Headphones for Music, Movies and especially Gaming! 5 stars, can't fault them, they look great too, just don't take them outside, they're open back and don't block out any exterior sound and they let sound out so others can hear it, this is fair enough though considering they are open back for a reason, you get that amazing airy sound and perfect quality of music! Perfect headphones for any enthusiast!
customer_reviews.author: David Saberton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones
customer_reviews.text: These cans are truly phenomenal. They are extremely light-weight and comfortable (one barely feel them while on), and the colour scheme - while contentious - is original and to my liking. However the most important bit for a pair of headphones is the sound quality, and it is truly superb. The mid-range in particular is of exceptional clarity, but the low and high frequencies are also beautifully rendered, always with the idea to reproduce an authentic sound, as if we were with the musicians. I owned a pair of Sennheiser PX-360, and compared to these, although more pricey, the HD598 are undeniably a substantial step-up in quality. Worth every pound!
customer_reviews.author: samson631

customer_reviews.title: Well done sennheiser for good design. Being a sound engineer this is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally a set of head phone that let you change the cable. Comes with 3.5mm jack to a locking end. One twist of the special fitting on the headphones I can change to 1/4" jack. Well done sennheiser for good design. Being a sound engineer this is a great feature. bought these for work to replace my ugly as sin sennheiser DT100's. Look better with that nice flat frequency response not unlike the DT100. Very comfy and sound great. Got them in the Black Friday sale. Bit there hand off for this deal. Good by great service.
customer_reviews.author: Steven ford

customer_reviews.title: They're fantastic for what I need and are really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these so I could plug into my guitar amplifier. I've got s dog at home who's not to keen on loud noises. They're fantastic for what I need and are really comfortable. Only trued them with amp so can only comment on what I use them for. Well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: caldabhoy

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck, by a mile.
customer_reviews.text: They look great, fit very comfortably, sound amazing, have a wonderful retro appeal, and are superb value for the money. As other reviewers have noted, though, these are not for using in the presence of others - they do leak sound. But if you are able to listen in isolation, when others have gone to bed, say, and you want to be tranpsorted to musical Nirvana, buy these. You'll be blown away. (See my review on the Project Headbox S dedicated headphone amp for more.)
customer_reviews.author: R. KING

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying my music collection all over again!!
customer_reviews.text: Initial impressions* Been using them for a week and never thought I could love sound so much. They are strictly stay at home headphones with a long cable . Really enjoying them and listening to my music collection all over again. It has been a while since I have had high end headphones but I really love the open back design. 10/10 so far for comfort and sound which is what these should be measured off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are also very comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones to use with my stage piano after the previous headphones got stepped on. There was an immediately noticable difference with these headphones picking up every nuance of the sampled piano sounds with a lot of clarity. I had previously tried the piano with some high end headphones but none of the previous phones I had tried faithfully reproduced the sounds as clearly as this, with most of them over emphasising the bass too much. These headphones are also very comfortable to wear. Would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for clear, fathifully reproduced sound at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones
customer_reviews.text: After a fair amount of research into a well-rounded pair of headphones that i could use for gaming, movies and music, i decided on these. I was not disappointed. The sound clarity and stage is phenomenal, as it has been said a million times, it's not bass heavy, so bass heads may want to steer clear but it provides the sound quality that I had read so much about.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dias

customer_reviews.title: Just right.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing headphones. Good build quality and don't kill my ears like my PX3's did from turtle beach. If you want a lightweight but powerful headset then this is the one. Isn't too overpowering with the bass and in my opinion the levels are just right.
customer_reviews.author: Sean O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit. Still in one piece after all of this time. (Ordered well over a year ago). Most importantly, they sound fantastic. The open backed design means the sound bleeds into the room, so not for a private or shared space.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Johns

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This pair of headphone is not very impressive out of the box, but it will be striking to your ears after burn in of hours. I mainly listen to classical. The soundstage is excellent with a marvelous concert hall feeling. They are super comfort, hardly feel wearing them. The only downside is there's no portable bag along with the package. Anyway, I'll get one myself:)
customer_reviews.author: FLORA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent sound quality and still going strong after 2 years and counting
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Durden

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sound and design
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones ever, so far. I used Beats, Sennheiser HD 555, 558, Momentum, but these are simply amazing. Great sound, amazing comfort and they look and feel like a piece of a great furniture. I can highly recommend them. Sold Momentum to get these haedphones and couldn't be more happy.
customer_reviews.author: chris panas

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: These are superb quality and superb value. I needed a pair of monitors for when I am recording voice overlays onto pre-recorded video. These work exceptionally well. Sound is crisp and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones that do not require an AMP to run
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones that do not require an AMP to run, so they'll work as intended no matter what the source. That said, I do not like the aesthetics (color) and since purchased the HD700's from Amazon.de
customer_reviews.author: justnvc

customer_reviews.title: Good for gaming, extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not too much of an audio geek but they sound pretty good to me and damn they are comfortable, sometimes I forget they are even on. Very good sound-stage for playing games such as CS GO where pinpointing sounds is key.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: now I know how good they are I would have no problem paying full ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought during a sale, now I know how good they are I would have no problem paying full price. Perfect for PC gaming (I don't need a mic) and music.
customer_reviews.author: Kev Cowley

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Sennheiser make high quality headphones which sound good. These look good, are very comfortable and the build quality is excellent. Having said that, if you like bass heavy 'phones look elsewhere. But if you like hi fi sound and listen to CD quality music these are brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great sound + very "open"
customer_reviews.text: Reduced to £50. Great sound + very "open" out walking you seem to hear the birds and planes more and wonder if its on the track.
customer_reviews.author: DrJRB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These are a good pair of headphones. Very clear and natural sound, not too heavy on the low end I'm glad to say, gentle and rounded high end, and very nice 'airy' stereo picture – I like the space there especially – it feels like there is plenty of air between the cans and the ears . Comfortable materials and weight too. Very 'un-fatiguing' and enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Fully recommend
customer_reviews.text: I'm no audiophile but after many good recommendations I picked these up and have not been disappointed. Great for music and movies, OK for video games.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gibbard

customer_reviews.title: Not good for jogging
customer_reviews.text: Jack is a bit big. Not good for jogging. But decent sound.
customer_reviews.author: bh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable but I didn't like its fade sound. Had to return and buy AD900x.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones. They bleed quite a lot so aren't ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphones. They bleed quite a lot so aren't the best for using at work (I still do, just quietly), and for Bass music you'll probably find you want a little bottom end EQ boost, but they're very clear and the bass is perfectly audible for all other styles which is all you want. These easily beat my studio monitors for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nicholas J. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for classical music
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for classical music, a beautiful rounded sound, no HEAVY bass or screeching treble and extremely comfortable. Great buy recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Trellis

customer_reviews.title: Very good. But Philips Fidelio X1 or X2 is better
customer_reviews.text: It's original Sennheiser. Very good. But Philips Fidelio X1 or X2 is better. The difference: Sennheiser HD 598 has less bass, less comfortable. The sound is amplified less. With DAC Fiio or other is good.
customer_reviews.author: mioi

customer_reviews.title: Great quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great quality headphones. They were recommended to me by a friend. I mainly use them for gaming, but they completely outperform my previous Razr Kraken 7.1 surround headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Richard M

customer_reviews.title: Solid pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, a great pair of headphones, I compared these to the siberia steelseries 650 headset and realised that there was an incredibly noticeable difference between the audio quality. Definitely recommend buying these just for the pure audio quality as well as the amazing comfortability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought it during the Today's Deals a few months ago at a really great price. I have always loved the Sennheiser sound. Nice looking, good detail and sufficient bass. Could be a little more comfortable but overall a really good pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've had
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant open sound, really good for anyone who likes their music and a nice price point for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Love

customer_reviews.title: Very very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional headphones. Very very pleased with the product. Brilliant clarity across all ranges, and not stupidly bass-heavy like a lot of headphones at the moment. A very "true" sound. The only thing i will say, is that you really do notice if you're listening to a low quality song, as these headphones will do it no favours.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: ... the money I have to say these are a great set of cans
customer_reviews.text: For the money I have to say these are a great set of cans. These are my partners I have a set HD800 but I still found that these cans are very good.
customer_reviews.author: mr b grocott

customer_reviews.title: I've used these every day since I've had them pretty much non stop
customer_reviews.text: I've used these every day since I've had them pretty much non stop. They are the real deal. AMAZING for watching movies and gaming. Perfect sound clarity and sound stage for music. I have gone back to all the old songs I used to like and listened to them again. With these on it's like listening to them again for the first time. Check out the reviews on head-fi forum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect . The sound is very nicely balanced . Very comfortable too. I bought them for around £120 on offer and find them excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: jason hearn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ,but
customer_reviews.text: Tried these headphones and the sound is unbelievable ,I would have to listen to my whole music collection again as I heard sounds that were not there before,perfect clear sound,worked perfectly with Sony Ericcson phone,super comfortable could be worn all day no problem ,unfortunately they let a lot of sound out so would not suit someone using them on a train etc or in bed as my wife quickly pointed out,I returned them to Amazon who quickly refunded no questions and I will buy another set of sennheiser headphone but not open circumaural.
customer_reviews.author: Sancho Panza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing. The sound is brilliant, they look great and they are extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Compton

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Utterly perfect clarity, fit, and quality. I've come to expect nothing less from Sennheiser, having owned at least five different products of theirs, and these headphones are no exception.
customer_reviews.author: TwentyZeroOne

customer_reviews.title: love these. bought during the black friday sale for ...
customer_reviews.text: love these. bought during the black friday sale for £75 which seems to be a great price for headphones of this quallity
customer_reviews.author: bingogazingo

customer_reviews.title: first really good sennheiser product in catalogue
customer_reviews.text: the right audio quality for that price - the discounted one. Too expensive at the usual. first really good sennheiser product in catalogue, the lower ones are not.... good details, passable sound scene, just a bit heavy on head
customer_reviews.author: fabio

customer_reviews.title: you wont regret
customer_reviews.text: coming up from normal generic headsets and headphones from logiech / razer /microsoft i upgraded to this best desicion i made in my life i didn't need an amp since my motherboard already had a built one in it (gigabyte ud4 z87) be sure to use good quality music like on soundcloud to really bring them alive sound : 5/5 comfert : 5/5 style :5/5 built quality 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Taken my listening experience to the next level. Never used Open headphones before and with Flac files it is bringing back to life my love for music.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these headphones. Fabulous sound. Bought for Christmas present and still amazing. Really happy as he is quite fussy about the sound from his headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sennheiser HD598 Special Edition
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing sound and quality, for those who are not sure is it worth it? Well I can say freely yes it's worth it. This is for sure best buy product in my eyes, great price for great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dario

customer_reviews.title: These are my favourite headphones, I spent months doing research that was ...
customer_reviews.text: These are my favourite headphones, I spent months doing research that was well spent as they were an amazing buy!
customer_reviews.author: Oliver McBlain

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, and of course, great sound. The cord is long enough that I no longer need an extension like I did with my old headset.
customer_reviews.author: DDB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, crisp sound quality - really really comfortable too
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, crisp sound quality - really really comfortable too. They aren't sound proof, they leak a lot of sound so on public transport I use low volume but I wouldn't change them for anything. If you want high quality music headphones for around £100, these are great. Worth £200
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: headphone like no other
customer_reviews.text: easy to drive via iphone, great amount of detail, very wide soundstage, great instrument speration, so comfortable. the only con is the that the cable is too long :(
customer_reviews.author: satpurkh singh

customer_reviews.title: the sex
customer_reviews.text: pretty much the title i have had the 558's but these are detail hungry buggers. amazing. i don't want to go on as there's plenty of other reviews for that. i just want to say amazing! paired with a Audinst HUD-MX1 amp/dac - witch is a lovely complement to these.
customer_reviews.author: ripstick

customer_reviews.title: Not only is the sound quality immense, they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Not only is the sound quality immense, they are without a doubt the comfiest headphones ever. I can wear them for hours at a time without any discomfort or getting hot. They come with two different length leads and are changeable which is really convenient
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great performance for the money.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones do need several hours of burn in, but once these cans settle....they deliver a fantastic audio performance. Would highly recommend this, but not for those who intend to use it whilst on the move. They do leak a lot of sound which is expected due to its open-back design. And comfort wise, I have no problem using these for hours of continual use.
customer_reviews.author: Kash D.

customer_reviews.title: Glad on special offer - nice wide spectrum and good ...
customer_reviews.text: Glad on special offer - nice wide spectrum and good sound, nice long lead and gold plated mini jacks. Full price nearly £200 wd be too much for me
customer_reviews.author: bobs-piano

customer_reviews.title: I really like the sound of them for all sorts of music ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these daily for some time now. I really like the sound of them for all sorts of music and audiobooks.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pridgeon

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are extremely good, perfect for Gaming
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are extremely good, perfect for Gaming, which i use them for, very good bass, great noise, very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: The Taylors

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. Very comfortable even for long periods
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Very comfortable even for long periods. Great soundstage and balance between bass, mids and highs. Very relaxing sound signature that brings out the details in your music. Best headphones I've bought so far.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably good!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing cans and incredibly versatile. They even make iPhone's and iPods sound incredible but plug them into the headphone socket of your HiFi amp or AV receiver and they'll blow your mind. So easy to listen too, never harsh but with lots of detail. They are also the most comfortable headphones I've ever worn by far. For the price they are a no brainer - get some now!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Love them clean sound
customer_reviews.text: Love them clean sound, although you cannot rely tell difference unless you got different headsets on at the same time
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. Geremezoglu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones, took a really long time to break in tho
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones. Way better than the HD497 it replaced. They did sound very thin at first and took a really long time to loosen up but now the lower octaves (bass) are really coming through.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Masters

customer_reviews.title: High end - high quality
customer_reviews.text: Clear neutral sound, very comfortable for long periods (even when wearing glasses). As they are open backed they will irritate anyone in the same room...
customer_reviews.author: Keith Marlow

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and very, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: You can wear these headphones for hours without discomfort. And the sound performance is excellent, as I suppose you'd expect, given the price. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Clive

customer_reviews.title: Renewed pleasure for my music.
customer_reviews.text: What a pleasure enjoying huge / powerful guitar solos on these headphones. Rediscovered my music. And discovered more. New appetite for listening.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, top sound but only for home use . recommend Highley, ,,,
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

product_meta.title: Sennheiser HD 598 Over-Ear Headphones - Black (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:BlackSennheiser HD 598 Over-Ear Headphones - Black.

BOX CONTAINS
HD 598 Special Edition headphones
Cable 1: 3 m copper cable (OFC)/ 6.3mm straight plug
Cable 2: 1.2m audio cable/3.5mm straight plug;3.5mm adaptor plug
feature_bullets: High clarity and increased bass for a fully immersive music and movie experience
Wide soundstage that will pick every detail in your music and hear the tiny nuances you have never heard before
Field-replaceable parts for a long lifespan
Every detail and layer of your music is audible
Ergonomic acoustic refinement (E.A.R.) design channels the audio signal directly into your ears

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
